title: How far are we technologically from mind control? - Quora

response.answer_text: A long way science can effect what brain areas are active with electrical stimulation, magnets and possibly sound waves but has no real idea what they are playing with. It is our consciousness an energy regulator that actives brain areas and this is very hard to observe measure and manipulate with technology, its particles/strings are probably 100 billion times smaller than a proton and considered not to have mass. I can control my mind with EGMi at least control which brain hemisphere I am using, its a neat trick and did not take long to learn I switch my right brain to standby so I have no anxiety/sin Buddha and Jesus would be well pleased.

We can produce limited effects right now, today. Knocking people out, producing simple emotions… It’s not PRACTICAL in any way, and can’t be weaponized per se… But we can do it now. If you mean sci-fi level ‘thought control’, like, puppetmaster kind of stuff… I predict 20 years or less. AI will allow us to do some crazy stuff.
